text: one God and Father of all,Here is the Trinity again—the Spirit in verse 4, the Son in verse 5 and the Father in verse 6. who is over all and through all and in usPerhaps 4% of the Greek manuscripts omit “us” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.), while another 4% read ‘you’ (as in AV and NKJV). all.
